name: Procedural Platformer Level Generator
description:
This is not a game. It's a procedural level generator. Every time you refresh the level, it randoms minor "chunks", that together build a diferent level each time. Feel free to test as many as possible combinations, but there's no enemies nor objectives to do.

--- CONTROLS ---

Arrows: Move - the eagle it's just an avatar for you to move through the level.

Q: Zoom out - if you want to see the entire level.

E: Zoom in - restore the original zoom level.

F5: refresh the game, creating a brand new level.
